value.title: PowerShell in Azure Cloud Shell GA | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Maertens and Scott Hanselman discuss updates made to PowerShell in Azure Cloud Shell. Learn about PowerShell Core in Linux, new Azure VM remoting cmdlets, and integration with Exchange. [00:43]  Demo Start   Azure Cloud Shell documentation https://aka.ms/azfr/490/01  Quickstart for PowerShell in

value.title: The new Azure Functions experience | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn about the new and improved way to create and manage Azure Functions using the Azure Portal.
